title: Console Log Filter UI Live Updates Pattern
details: Implementation of live-updating filter UI in popup.html/popup.js (v1.6.0.12): **Key Pattern - Immediate UI Updates:** - Counter updates: Real-time "X/Y" indicator next to category title showing checked/total filters - Button colors: Green when all selected, red when none selected, normal otherwise - Updates triggered by: checkbox change events, button clicks, initial load **Implementation Details:** 1. **HTML Structure:** - Removed `(# categories)` label - Added `X/Y` next to title - Added `` for flex spacing - Buttons inline with title (not underneath) 2. **CSS Classes:** - `.group-btn.all-selected` - Green background (#4caf50) for Select All when all checked - `.group-btn.all-deselected` - Red background (#f44336) for Deselect All when none checked - `.group-counter` - Green text color (#4caf50) for live counter display 3. **JavaScript Functions:** - `updateGroupCounter(groupElement)` - Updates "X/Y" text immediately - `updateButtonColors(groupElement)` - Adds/removes color classes based on state - `updateAllGroupStates()` - Updates all groups (called on load) - Event listeners on `.category-checkbox` for 'change' event 4. **Integration Points:** - `initCollapsibleGroups()` adds change listeners to all checkboxes - `loadFilterSettings()` calls `updateAllGroupStates()` after loading settings - Button click handlers call update functions after toggling checkboxes **Testing Considerations:** - When testing outside browser extension context (local file server), browserAPI is null - Event listeners still work when manually triggered - All functions validate correctly when called programmatically - In actual extension context, everything works automatically **Files Modified:** - popup.html: Updated filter group structure, added counter spans, CSS for button states - popup.js: Added update functions and change event listeners
